Elizabeth Turman-Bryant
=======================

[City Council](https://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)
Title: Councilmember
Phone:
360-755-0531

Current Term: January 1, 2024 - December 31, 2027

This is Elizabeth Turman-Bryant's first term as Councilmember for Ward 3.

Councilmember Turman-Bryant is the elected Mayor Pro-Tempore. Elizabeth is Chair of the Arts Commission and Chair of the North Star Advisory Committee and serves on Parks & Recreation Board and Downtown Burlington Association. Elizabeth is also an alternate member on the Lodging Tax Committee.
